content: this free crochet infinity scarf pattern is perfect for beginners or experienced crocheters looking for a quick and easy crochet project view this pattern for free 1 watch the video tutorial 2 materials king cole riot or any yarn for my sample i used the colorway pink sky this yarn is 30% wool and 70% premium acrylic 324 yds/100g g+/4 5mm hook or any hook appropriate for your yarn yarn needle scissors 1 https //www ktandthesquid com/2024/05/01/free-crochet-infinity-scarf-pattern/ 2 https //youtu be/da5nk5o9tda
